subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: For players, any trip is a lesson in unintended consequences. Ivy League trips, with back-to-back games scheduled on Friday and Saturday so players don’t miss as much class, are even more so.
snippet: For players, any trip is a lesson in unintended consequences. Ivy League trips, with back-to-back games scheduled on Friday and Saturday so players don’t miss as much class, are even more so.
